name: test_step_parameters
description:
>>> import pytest
    >>> import allure

    >>> @allure.step
    ... def step(arg, kwarg=None):
    ...     pass

    >>> @pytest.mark.parametrize(
    ...     ["args", "kwargs"],
    ...     [
    ...         ([True], {"kwarg": False}),
    ...         (["hi"], {"kwarg": None}),
    ...         ([None], {"kwarg": 42})
    ...     ]
    ... )
    ... def test_step_parameters(args, kwargs):
    ...     step(*args, **kwargs)
